name: react-foundation-components
description: Foundation Sites components built with the power of React and CSS Modules

scripts.lint: eslint src && eslint docs && eslint examples && sass-lint --verbose
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel --quiet src --out-dir lib && cpy "**/*.scss" ../lib --parents --cwd=src && node create-flex-components.js && node create-global-scoped-components.js
scripts.build-docs: npm run clean && npm run build && webpack --config docs/webpack.config.js
scripts.start-docs: npm run build && node server.js docs/webpack.config.js --dev
scripts.start-examples-css-modules: npm run build && node server.js examples/css-modules/webpack.config.js
scripts.start-examples-global: npm run build && node server.js examples/global/webpack.config.js
scripts.start-examples-global-flex: npm run build && node server.js examples/global-flex/webpack.config.js
scripts.start-examples-cdn: npm run build && node server.js examples/cdn/webpack.config.js
scripts.start-examples-cdn-flex: npm run build && node server.js examples/cdn-flex/webpack.config.js
scripts.install: npm run clean && babel --quiet src --out-dir lib && cpy "**/*.scss" ../lib --parents --cwd=src && node create-flex-components.js && node create-global-scoped-components.js

author: aruberto
